ai_logic.flor_priority_on_truco: Player called Truco, but I have Flor. Flor has priority.
ai_logic.envido_primero_logic: Player called Truco, but Envido is possible. Evaluating Envido Primero...
ai_logic.flor_priority_on_envido: Player called Envido, but I have Flor. Flor voids and beats Envido.
ai_logic.opportunity_logic_certain_win: Certain win opportunity in final trick detected.
ai_logic.decision_play_card_parda_y_gano: Decision: Playing {{cardName}} to secure the round win via 'Parda y Gano'.
ai_logic.decision_play_card_certain_win: Decision: Playing {{cardName}} to secure the round win with certainty.
ai_logic.lopsided_hand_check: Lopsided hand detected (Envido: {{envidoPoints}}, Truco Strength: {{trucoStrength}}). Considering bait...
ai_logic.lopsided_hand_decision: Decision: Playing lopsided hand bait with {{cardName}}.
ai_logic.bait_tactic_check_body: Hand is top-heavy with {{strongest}}. Considering a bait play.
ai_logic.bait_tactic_skipped: Skipped bait tactic, proceeding with standard logic.
ai_logic.decision_play_highest_mano: Decision: I am 'mano', playing my highest card {{cardName}} to secure the trick.
ai_logic.decision_play_lowest_not_mano: Decision: I am not 'mano', playing my lowest card {{cardName}} to probe.
ai_logic.decision_play_highest_won_trick1: Decision: I won trick 1, playing highest card {{cardName}} to win the round.
ai_logic.decision_play_highest_lost_trick1: Decision: I lost trick 1, must play highest card {{cardName}} to stay in.
ai_logic.decision_play_highest_tied_trick1: Decision: Trick 1 was a tie, this is decisive. Playing highest card {{cardName}}.
ai_logic.decision_play_last_card: Decision: Only one card left, playing {{cardName}}.
ai_logic.round_analysis: Full round analysis shows playing {{cardName}} wins the round.
ai_logic.decision_play_weakest_winner: Decision: Playing my weakest winning card: {{cardName}}.
ai_logic.strategic_play_parda_canto: Strategic Play Check: Parda y Canto.
ai_logic.parda_canto_reason: I can tie with {{tyingCard}} and have {{aceInHole}} in reserve. This hides my strength.
ai_logic.decision_play_tie: Decision: Playing {{tyingCard}} to tie the trick.
ai_logic.decision_play_lowest_winning: Decision: I can win. Playing my lowest winning card: {{cardName}} (Value: {{value}}).
ai_logic.decision_play_discard_lowest: Decision: I cannot win this trick. Discarding my lowest card: {{cardName}}.
ai_logic.truco_risk_penalty_check: Weak Truco hand (Strength: {{trucoStrength}}). Calculating risk penalty.
ai_logic.trap_check_body: I have the nuts (Strength: {{strength}}) and am configured to be Deceptive.
ai_logic.decision_accept_trap: Decision: Smooth calling (Accept) to trap the opponent for future points.
ai_logic.falta_suicide_prevention: Falta Envido Suicide Prevention: Score is low and hand ({{points}}) is not elite. Penalizing move.
ai_logic.low_envido_penalty: Penalty for extremely low envido ({{points}}). Forcing fold to prevent irrational bluffing.
ai_logic.inference_general: No strong constraints. Using all {{count}} unseen cards to generate possible hands.
ai_logic.win_prob_simulation:
Win Probability (Simulation):
- vs Strong Hands ({{strongCount}}): {{strongProb}}%
- vs Medium Hands ({{mediumCount}}): {{mediumProb}}%
- vs Weak Hands ({{weakCount}}): {{weakProb}}%
ai_logic.do_or_die_body: Opponent wins if I fold ({{declinePoints}} pts) or if I accept and lose ({{losePoints}} pts).
ai_logic.decision_do_or_die_accept: Decision: I must accept. It's my only chance.

bluff_analysis.title: End-of-Round Bluff Analysis
bluff_analysis.error_no_card: Error: No card for me to analyze.
bluff_analysis.body: My last card is {{cardName}}. Analyzing if opponent can beat it.
bluff_analysis.stats: Weaker unseen cards: {{weakerCount}} of {{totalCount}}. Probability my card wins (bluff): {{probability}}%.
bluff_analysis.error_no_unseen: Error: No unseen cards to analyze.

ai_logic.defeat_analysis: Defeat Analysis: Win probability is extremely low ({{winProb}}%).
ai_logic.scaled_desperation_bluff_chance: Base desperation bluff chance (based on {{winProb}}% win prob): {{baseChance}}%
ai_logic.decision_desperation_bluff: Decision: Attempting a desperation bluff with {{call}}.
ai_logic.decision_fold_overwhelming_odds: Decision: Folding. The odds are overwhelming.
ai_logic.decision_escalate_strong_hand: Decision: Strong hand ({{percentile}}%). Risking an escalation.
ai_logic.decision_escalate_bluff_weak_hand: Decision: Bluffing an escalation with a weak hand.
ai_logic.decision_accept_weak_hand_bluff_call: Decision: Accepting with a weak hand ('calling the bluff').
ai_logic.final_escalation_logic: Final Escalation Logic: My last card is {{cardName}}.
ai_logic.opponent_inference_could_have_better: It's possible they have a better card (e.g., {{cardName}}).
ai_logic.opponent_inference_no_better: It's unlikely they have a better card.
ai_logic.decision_escalate_dominant_card: Decision: Escalating to {{call}} with a dominant card.
ai_logic.mixed_strategy_decision: Decision on the edge. Using mixed strategy (chance: {{chance}}%).
ai_logic.pre_commitment_simulate_q: If I call {{myCall}}, would I accept an opponent's {{playerCall}}?
ai_logic.pre_commitment_result_fold: Result: No. I would fold. This is a bad escalation.
ai_logic.decision_pre_commitment_accept_instead: Decision: Bad escalation. Accepting Truco instead.
ai_logic.pre_commitment_result_accept: Result: Yes. I would stay in. The escalation is safe.
ai_logic.decision_truco_won_trick1: Decision: Won trick 1. Calling Truco to press advantage.
ai_logic.accept_envido_good_odds: Accepting Envido, my odds are good.
ai_logic.decline_envido_weak: Declining Envido, my points are low.
ai_logic.decision_falta_win: Decision: Calling Falta Envido to win the game.
ai_logic.escalate_envido_advantage: Escalating to Real Envido, I have an advantage.
ai_logic.escalate_envido_strong: Escalating with Envido-Envido, my points are strong.
ai_logic.flor_response_contraflor: Opponent has Flor, but I do too. Calling Contraflor.
ai_logic.flor_response_acknowledge: Opponent has Flor, I do not. I must acknowledge.
ai_logic.inference_flor_contradiction: Contradiction: Opponent's played cards are not of the same suit. Ignoring Flor constraint.
ai_logic.inference_flor_hypothesis: Hypothesis: Opponent holds one of {{count}} possible Flor hands.
ai_logic.inference_envido: Inference Constraint: Opponent revealed having {{points}} Envido.
ai_logic.inference_envido_hypothesis: Hypothesis: Opponent holds one of {{count}} possible hands with {{points}} Envido.
ai_logic.inference_truco_behavioral: Behavioral Inference (Truco): Based on history (avg: {{avgStrength}}, std: {{stdDev}}), opponent's hand strength is likely between {{min}} and {{max}}.
ai_logic.inference_truco_hypothesis: Hypothesis: Opponent has one of {{count}} hands matching their Truco profile.
ai_logic.inference_truco_hypothesis_failed: Hypothesis Failed: No possible hands match opponent's Truco profile. Using all hands.
ai_logic.inference_truco_early: General Inference (Early Truco): Assuming an early Truco call requires an above-average hand.
ai_logic.inference_truco_early_hypothesis: Hypothesis: Opponent has one of {{count}} above-average hands.
ai_logic.inference_truco_early_hypothesis_failed: Hypothesis Failed: No possible hands are above average.
ai_logic.inference_error_not_enough_cards: Inference Error: Not enough unseen cards to build a hand.
ai_logic.inference_envido_passive: Passive Inference (Envido): Opponent did not call Envido when they had the chance.
ai_logic.inference_envido_passive_filter: Filtering out hands with Envido > {{threshold}}. Before: {{before}}, After: {{after}}.
ai_logic.inference_envido_passive_filter_failed: Envido passive filter not applied (too few samples remaining).
ai_logic.inference_error_no_hands: Inference Error: Could not generate valid opponent hands.
ai_logic.bait_type_low: Bait Analysis: Playing the lowest card.
ai_logic.bait_type_mid: Bait Analysis: Playing the middle card as a more convincing bait.
ai_logic.no_cards_left: I have no cards left to play.
ai_logic.decision_value_truco_strong_hand: Decision: Value betting Truco with strong hand (Strength: {{strength}}, Threshold: {{threshold}})
ai_logic.decision_bluff_truco_weak_hand: Decision: Bluffing Truco with weak hand.

envido_calc.multiple_cards: Two cards of the same suit ({{suit}}): {{card1}} and {{card2}}.
envido_calc.single_card: Cards of different suits. Using the highest: {{card}} (Value: {{value}}).
